data.htmlContent: Ready to get your sip on? ğŸ˜‰ The Olive Garden drink menu is where the party's at! Whether you're craving a bottomless Raspberry Lemonade (a true icon!) or a classy cocktail to go with your breadsticks, they've got you covered. Let's dive into all the delicious drink options for 2025! ğŸš€

NON-ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES.description: Not drinking? No problem! These non-alcoholic superstars are here to save the day. So refreshing! âœ¨

items.name: Gallon Iced Teas & Raspberry Lemonade
items.review: Hosting a party? Be the hero and bring a gallon of this liquid gold. Your friends will thank you. Trust.

items.name: Raspberry Lemonade
items.review: So refreshing! ğŸ‹ The perfect balance of sweet and tart. It's the ultimate thirst quencher. Plus, it's bottomless. What's not to love? ğŸ¥¤

items.question: Does the Olive Garden Drink menu have free refills?
items.answer: You know it! âœ… Olive Garden hooks you up with FREE refills on all their soft drinks, lemonades, teas, and even the 'CaffÃ¨ la Toscana'. Drink up!

items.question: What non-alcoholic drinks are on the menu?
items.answer: Tons! You can grab Italian Bottled Water if you're feeling fancy, or go for their legendary Raspberry Lemonade, Classic Lemonade, Iced Teas, and all the usual fountain drinks. ğŸ¥¤

items.question: Are there kid-friendly drinks at Olive Garden?
items.answer: Of course! The little ones are covered with options like Milk, Fruit Juices, and yummy Lemonade. They won't be left out of the fun. ğŸ™Œ
